Signatures and avatars were reverted to as they were in October 2012. Many people observed that their old sigs and avatars came back, as that information was preserved in the old backup.

My account was not deleted, but after the forums came up the registered password was different than what it was before the forums went down. Since I did not remember the password I tried to reset, but that service was down until sometime today. Works now though! I was really confused though because my account is really old, so it made no sense that I could not log in.

It's likely that the problems with password resets and email activations have to do with the surge of registrations. The emails become backlogged in the server when there is a spike in new registrations because other email servers start rejecting them as possible spam. It takes a few hours for the other servers to realize that they're legitimate and start accepting them again.
